import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { IEventProductRatingComment } from '../event-product-rating-comment.model'; @Component({ selector: 'jhi-event-product-rating-comment-detail', templateUrl: './event-product-rating-comment-detail.component.html', }) export class EventProductRatingCommentDetailComponent implements OnInit { eventProductRatingComment: IEventProductRatingComment | null = null; constructor(protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ eventProductRatingComment }) => { this.eventProductRatingComment = eventProductRatingComment; }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } }
